title: erprompt-lib Mock Data Output
description: Mock dataset generated from an Entity JSON. Used to seed json-server db.json collections.

schema.description: Entity schemaId in the form '<escopo>/<CodigoEntidade>'. Example: 'fiscal/Nfe'.

resource.description: json-server collection name (path part of the endpoint). Example: 'nfes'.

count.description: Number of records generated in items.

items.description: Array of records compatible with the entity json_schema.required and property types.
